title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert For Frozen Mushroom Risotto Products Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergen
summary: Editor’s Note: April 5, 2024 – Details of this public health alert were updated to reflect additional misbranded products that were produced and distributed. The distribution area was also expanded to include retail locations in Michigan. WASHINGTON, Jan. 5, 2024 – The U.S. Department of...
impacted_products: •	7.5-oz. cardboard packages labeled as “Wild Fork Porcini Mushroom Risotto Bites” with lot code 101231, “BEST BY DATE: 10/11/2024”, and EST. 39896 on the side of the box
•	7.5-oz. cardboard packages labeled as “Wild Fork Porcini Mushroom Risotto Bites” with lot code 361231, “BEST BY DATE: 6/27/2025,” and EST. 32068 on the side of the box.
